metadata.title: CVE-2018-20196 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
There is a stack-based buffer overflow in the third instance of thecalculate_gain function in libfaad/sbr_hfadj.c in Freeware Advanced AudioDecoder 2 (FAAD2) 2.8.8. A crafted input will lead to a denial of serviceor possibly unspecified other impact because the S_M array is mishandled.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-20196` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

faad - 2.8.8-3.2
libfaad2 - 2.8.8-3.2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: faad2 package in esm-apps/jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.8.8-3.2').
